title: Tell me i'm freaking out for no reason
text: hello, i'm 1 year & 6 months post op. i'm down 160 lbs & have been doing and feel great for the past year. I've been pretty careful with what I eat (obviously) but today I accidentally swallowed a piece of gum. I am trying very hard to not freak myself out but I would like to know if I should be concerned or not. I am very much a hypochondriac lol, and sometimes just hearing from someone else that i'll be fine helps. ty in advance
key_phrases: trying very hard to not freak out
relevance_reason: Strong bariatric context (post-op discussion) but no PBH or hypoglycemia indicators.
